sentences.sContent: I shall be pleased to preside at your meetings.
sentences.sCn: 我很高兴主持你们的会议。

sentences.sContent: Mr Justice Waller, presiding judge for the northeast
sentences.sCn: 沃勒法官，东北地区的首席法官

remMethod.val: pre(…前的)+sid(坐)＋e→坐在前面主持→主持

trans.tranOther: to be in charge of a formal event, organization, ceremony etc
